A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Too many jokes. Bad timing of some of the jokes. First hour just seemed a Mrs and jumped all over the place. The Leia force scene was too much her surviving in outer space. Finally seeing Luke after all these years and it was just a badly written character I felt. Could have been so much more for his part. I felt there was no continuity from Force Awakens heading. 

Best part of the story was the kids re-enacting Luke's scene finally fulfilling his prophecy of the New Hope and the boy using the force to grab the broom. 


I will officially never see a Rien Johnson movie again.
